com.communote.server.web.commons.viewtool

Class UrlTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.commons.viewtool.RequestAwareTool
      • com.communote.server.web.commons.viewtool.UrlTool

  • @DefaultKey(value="urlTool")
 @ValidScope(value="request")
public class UrlTool
extends RequestAwareTool
    Tool for rendering application URLs.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

        public String insertSessionId(String url)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The url with session id inserted.

      • render

        public String render(String urlPath)
        Renders the URL for the specified urlPath. Delegates to #render(String, boolean, boolean) with parameters absolute and secure set to false.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL path
        Returns:
        the created URL

      • render

        public String render(String urlPath,
                     boolean absolute,
                     boolean secure,
                     boolean staticResource)
        Renders the URL for the specified urlPath. Delegates to #render(String, String, boolean, boolean, Boolean, String) with parameters baseUrl, renderSessionId and clientId set to null.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL path
        absolute - whether the URL should be rendered as an absolute URL
        secure - whether the URL should be rendered with the HTTPS protocol. Will be ignored if absolute is false.
        staticResource - true if the URL should be rendered as a resource not to be delivered by the dispatcher servlet
        Returns:
        the rendered URL

      • render

        public String render(String urlPath,
                     boolean absolute,
                     String channelTypeAsString,
                     boolean staticResource)
              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Renders the URL for the specified urlPath. Delegates to #render(String, String, boolean, boolean, Boolean, String) with parameters baseUrl, renderSessionId and clientId set to null.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL path
        absolute - whether the URL should be rendered as an absolute URL
        channelTypeAsString - The channel type as string to check against.
        staticResource - true if the URL should be rendered as a resource not to be delivered by the dispatcher servlet
        Returns:
        the rendered URL
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, when there is no such channel type.

      • render

        public String render(String urlPath,
                     String baseUrl,
                     boolean absolute,
                     boolean secure,
                     Boolean renderSessionId,
                     String clientId,
                     boolean staticResource)
        Renders the URL for the specified urlPath.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - the URL path
        baseUrl - optional string with a URL that should be prefixed to the urlPath. If set, the parameters absolute, secure and clientId will be ignored.
        absolute - whether the URL should be rendered as an absolute URL. Will be ignored if baseUrl is not null.
        secure - whether the URL should be rendered with the HTTPS protocol. Will be ignored if absolute is false or baseUrl is not null.
        renderSessionId - optional parameter to force inclusion of the current session ID. If null the session ID will be included if the request asked for an existing session and the session ID was not received via a cookie. If not null and true the ID of the current session will be included. In case there is no session the session will be created. If baseUrl is not null the session ID won't be included.
        clientId - the ID of the client to be included in the URL. If null the ID of the current client will be used. Will be ignored if baseUrl is not null.
        staticResource - true if the URL should be rendered as a resource which will not be handled by the dispatcher servlet
        Returns:
        the rendered URL

      • renderAttachmentUrl

        public String renderAttachmentUrl(Attachment attachment)
        Determine the relative attachment URL path for a resource
        Parameters:
        attachment - The attachment.
        Returns:
        the relative URL path for the attachment.

      • renderAttachmentUrl

        public String renderAttachmentUrl(Attachment attachment,
                                  boolean useAbsoluteUrl,
                                  boolean staticResource)
        Determine the resource URL for download/access for the given item
        Parameters:
        attachment - the attachment.
        useAbsoluteUrl - true to render absolute URL
        staticResource - true if the URL should be rendered as a resource which will not be handled by the dispatcher servlet
        Returns:
        URL for the attachment.

      • renderAttachmentUrl

        public String renderAttachmentUrl(AttachmentData attachment)
        Determine the relative attachment URL path for a resource
        Parameters:
        attachment - the attachment list item.
        Returns:
        the relative URL path for the attachment.

      • renderAttachmentUrl

        public String renderAttachmentUrl(AttachmentData attachment,
                                  boolean useAbsoluteUrl,
                                  boolean staticResource)
        Determine the resource URL for download/access for the given item
        Parameters:
        attachment - the attachment list item.
        useAbsoluteUrl - true to render absolute URL
        staticResource - true if the URL should be rendered as a resource which will not be handled by the dispatcher servlet
        Returns:
        URL for the attachment.

      • renderConcatenatedCssUrl

        public String renderConcatenatedCssUrl(String categoryName,
                                       boolean minimized)
        Render the URL to the concatenated CSS of a given category.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the category
        minimized - whether to return the minimized version of the concatenated CSS
        Returns:
        the URL to retrieve the concatenated CSS or empty string if the resource does not exist

      • renderConcatenatedJsUrl

        public String renderConcatenatedJsUrl(String categoryName,
                                      boolean minimized)
        Render the URL to the concatenated JavaScript of a given category.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the category
        minimized - whether to return the minimized version of the concatenated JavaScript
        Returns:
        the URL to retrieve the concatenated JavaScript or empty string if the resource does not exist

      • renderCssUrls

        public List<String> renderCssUrls(String categoryName,
                                  boolean minimized)
        Render the URLs to the CSS resources of the given category.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the category
        minimized - whether to render the URLs to the minimized versions
        Returns:
        the URLs to the CSS resources. The list will be empty if the category is not known.

      • renderIfRelative

        public String renderIfRelative(String urlPath)
        Uses render(String) to render the URL if it is relative, otherwise the URL is returned unchanged.

        Example:

        • https://github.com/communote remains https://github.com/communote
        • /portal/home becomes /microblog/global/portal/home

        Parameters:
        urlPath - the url to render
        Returns:
        the rendered or unmodified URL

      • renderJsUrls

        public List<String> renderJsUrls(String categoryName,
                                 boolean minimized)
        Render the URLs to the JavaScript resources of the given category.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the category
        minimized - whether to render the URLs to the minimized versions
        Returns:
        the URLs to the JavaScript resources. The list will be empty if the category is not known.

      • renderStartpage

        public String renderStartpage()
        Renders the startpage url.
        Returns:
        the startpage url

      • renderStatic

        public String renderStatic(String urlPath)
        Renders the URL of a static resource which is not delivered by the dispatcher servlet. This is a convenience function for the render method.
        Parameters:
        urlPath - The URL path.
        Returns:
        the rendered URL

      • renderStaticBase

        public String renderStaticBase(boolean absolute,
                               boolean secure,
                               String clientId)
        Renders the base URL of all static resources. This function won't add the sessionId or a timestamp request parameter.
        Parameters:
        absolute - whether the URL should be rendered as an absolute URL.
        secure - whether the URL should be rendered with the HTTPS protocol
        clientId - the ID of the client to be included in the URL. If null the ID of the current client will be used.
        Returns:
        the rendered URL
